name: ASD Type Zero
description:
ASD Type Zero is a classic Shoot'em up (shmup) that you can play on your Android device easily on the go and try to get a really good score, it features a world hi-score ranking where you can be the number one

This game is developed while I was writing this book that teaches you how to make Android games with your Phone, Table or PC, only one device is needed so you can make any game anywhere, check out the book here:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087H8TG3X

This book is NOT a recipe, it will teach you every aspect you need to know to make any game, no knowledge is required to pick it and it will explain everything you need to unleash your creativity. Feel free to ask anything =)
